content: Condominium Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Apr 2019I'm planning to buy a private condo. Should I sell or keep my HDB?I am going to buy a private condo with minimum loan and thinking if I shall sell my HDB due to the 12% ABSD? HDB is in Sembawang and the rental is not fantastic. I have no need to sell the HDB to fund my private condo. Shall I sell or keep my HDB?1 answerAnswerBump0

Yiyang ChenLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 09 Apr 2019Sell your HDB. the 12% ABSD is not worth it and value of HDB is falling.0 comments0
